title: log
description: This object represents the root of exported data

version.description: Version number of the format. If empty, string "1.1" is assumed by default.

creator.description: Name and version info of the log creator application.

browser.description: Name and version info of used browser.

pages.description: List of all exported (tracked) pages. Leave out this field if the application does not support grouping by pages.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.
